app.name: Relic AI
app.tagline: Uncover the past with AI-powered archaeological documentation

home.saveThePastDesc: Transform artifact photos into stunning 3D models with AI-generated scholarly analysis cards.
home.pastPaletteDesc: Restore historical colors to weathered artifacts using culturally-authentic AI colorization.
home.preservingHistory: Preserving History, One Artifact at a Time
home.aboutDescription: Relic AI combines cutting-edge artificial intelligence with archaeological expertise to help researchers, students, and enthusiasts document and understand historical artifacts. Our tools enable professional-grade documentation without expensive equipment.
